title: Blinking Supernovae
content: These are a series of images showing a supernova discovered in the galaxy NGC 6946. The first image was taken before the explosion and the last images were taken afterwards. Use the controls to pause, play, or skip between these images. Can you find the siupernova? First it appears as a bright star, but then it fades from view. When you spot the supernova, click on it.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Click on a point on the Image to select the supernova
